[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547348123343{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture10.jpg?id=1332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Working with ATR

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113358585{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

A trusted partner for your career

Your career is your livelihood. ATR’s deep staffing experience and commitment to finding out what makes you tick means we line up the perfect roles to get you where you want to be in life. But our focus on relationships doesn’t end there.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113366168{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Focused on relationships. Focused on you.

A diverse culture means your background is an asset and should be celebrated. Our next-generation TruRecruit process takes this into account, connecting you to the best positions at the most inclusive companies. When you win, we win, both today and into the future.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1404″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

When you need someone you can trust with your career, ATR is here for you.

 

View IT Jobs

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Career Blogs

Your 5-Minute Guide to Landing a College Internship

10.29.2019 | Candidate Blogs, Career Advice, IT jobs, Job Search

Internship. Internship. Internship. By now you’ve had a hundred different things about internships drilled into your head. While it’s great that college internships are on your radar, the plan for landing one can start to feel confusing or overwhelming when so many voices, articles, and tips are spinning through your mind. While there’s a lot […]

Read the Article

You Don’t Need A Resume If You’re Looking For An IT Job

09.25.2014 | Career Advice, IT jobs, Job Search

You are a busy IT professional. You may be happy in your current position or you may not, but either way, it is likely that the thought of what else lies out there for you professionally has crossed your mind. Could I make more money? Find a great place to work that is closer to […]

Read the Article

Why Everyone Should Care About Hot IT Jobs

03.27.2019 | IT jobs, Technology

Why do we like lists? It seems to be in our DNA; we like to order and rank things. It helps us understand the world more easily. Some lists are just for fun, while others can be quite serious. As ubiquitous as any are the “Best Paying” or “Hot” job lists, whether general or for […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • From my experience working with ATR has been a great experience. There is friendly, resourceful and personable staff that timely address my questions and concerns.

     

    -ATR Consultant

  • My recruiter was very good at communicating and setting up everything for my current contract. She answered all my questions promptly and always made sure someone was available for me.

     

    -ATR Consultant

  • I have used many temporary placement companies in the past but ATR International is much different from the rest. They are here to serve your needs, find you the best fitting job with the experience you have and care about you as an individual and not just another number. 

     

    -ATR Consultant

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1551381948186{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column]

    Check Out Our Job Seeker Guide

    Landing a new job is exciting. Finding a new job is work. Whether you’re actively looking for a new position, planning a future career move, or wondering what else is out there, all the “stuff” you have to do can seem daunting. Use our Job Seeker Guide to help you get started!

    Job seeker guide

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Job Alert Email Signup



    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
